## 🌍 Top 5 Global Fintech News

- **[Fintech founder charged with fraud; AI app found to be humans in the Philippines](https://techcrunch.com/2025/04/10/fintech-founder-charged-with-fraud-after-ai-shopping-app-found-to-be-powered-by-humans-in-the-philippines/)** — *Hacker News* — A fintech founder faces fraud charges after their AI-powered shopping app was revealed to be operated by human workers in the Philippines rather than actual artificial intelligence.

- **[Americans see their savings vanish in Synapse fintech crisis](https://www.cnbc.com/2024/11/22/synapse-bankruptcy-thousands-of-americans-see-their-savings-vanish.html)** — *Hacker News* — Thousands of Americans lost access to their savings following the bankruptcy of fintech middleware company Synapse, raising urgent questions about consumer protections in fintech banking partnerships.

- **[Fintech is making credit cards weirder](https://workweek.com/2022/08/05/fintech-is-making-credit-cards-weirder/)** — *Hacker News* — Fintech challengers are reimagining the traditional credit card with novel rewards structures, flexible credit models, and embedded features that blur the line between lending and lifestyle products.

- **[Apple acquires UK open banking startup Credit Kudos](https://ffnews.com/newsarticle/apple-acquires-uk-open-banking-startup-credit-kudos/)** — *Hacker News* — Apple has acquired UK-based open banking startup Credit Kudos, signalling the tech giant's growing ambitions in financial services and credit decisioning.

- **[Open Banking and Payments Competition](https://www.bitsaboutmoney.com/archive/open-banking-and-payments-competition/)** — *Hacker News* — A deep-dive analysis explores how open banking frameworks are reshaping payments competition and what that means for incumbents, fintechs, and consumers alike.

## 🍁 Top 5 Canadian Fintech News

- **[Neo Financial partners with United Airlines to launch credit card](https://betakit.com/neo-financial-partners-with-united-airlines-to-launch-credit-card/)** — *BetaKit* — Calgary-based Neo Financial is expanding its embedded finance footprint with a new co-branded travel credit card in partnership with United Airlines, deepening its push into rewards-linked financial products.

- **[Loop aims to make screen-scraping obsolete for business accounts](https://betakit.com/loop-aims-to-make-screen-scraping-obsolete-for-business-accounts/)** — *BetaKit* — Canadian fintech Loop is developing secure API-based data connectivity to replace screen-scraping for business bank accounts, a move directly aligned with Canada's open banking transition.

- **[A16z speedrun alum General Magic secures $7.2 million USD to make calling your insurance company less of a slog](https://betakit.com/a16z-speedrun-alum-general-magic-secures-7-2-million-usd-to-make-calling-your-insurance-company-less-of-a-slog/)** — *BetaKit* — General Magic has raised $7.2 million USD to build AI-powered voice automation for insurance customer service, tackling one of the most friction-heavy experiences in financial services.

- **[BMO posts record revenue across its business segments, beating expectations](https://financialpost.com/fp-finance/banking/bmo-revenue-business-segment-analyst-earnings-expectations)** — *Financial Post* — Bank of Montreal reported record revenues across all business segments while also reducing provisions for credit losses, signalling confidence in Canada's financial sector outlook.

- **[Business leaders urge Ottawa to extend employee ownership tax incentive](https://betakit.com/business-leaders-urge-ottawa-to-extend-employee-ownership-tax-incentive/)** — *BetaKit* — A coalition of Canadian business leaders is pressing the federal government to extend its employee ownership trust tax incentive, a policy with implications for startup succession and fintech ecosystem development.
